name: Omnisea
description: Omnichain Router - Our core contract connects multiple cross-chain messaging protocols such as LayerZero and Axelar Network. Omnisea NFT Launchpad - using our Omnichain Router, we provide ability to easily launch Omnichain NFTs collections and mint between chains - we're currently supporting Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Avalanche, Optimism, Arbitrum, and Fantom. OSEA is our omnichain ERC-20 Token built using LayerZero contracts. Available on Polygon (base, total supply controller), Ethereum, BNB Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, Optimism, and Arbitrum.
